tutorial.speak:
You can also embed a truly live stream by choosing the "Add Permanent Live URL" option.
With YouTube, there is the option to set this up one-time to always show whatever is currently live on your channel. To do so, you will need your channel I.D.
See the instructions on this page for how to find your channel I.D.
Fill out the rest of the details and provide a thumbnail image for the stream. For the duration, select how long to leave the stream live, including announcements before and after service.
Click "Save". You can now schedule your services to show this live stream from the services page.
